response.overview: Her origins are as dark and mysterious as she is. - A legend almost as old as time - Her reign of terror is unleashed upon new prey as she sets forth to bring blood into the kingdom for her Master. A group of friends are at a nearby reserve during lockdown, when she strikes, leaving terror in her wake. She is human, yet a creature of the darkness. She is intelligent and vicious. Stalking her prey until each one of the group has become her own. She is - The Manananggal.
response.title: Manananggal
